contents:
根据维基百科：

言论自由（英语：Freedom of speech），一种基本人权，指公民可以按照个人意愿表达意见和想法的法定政治权利，这些意见表达不用受政府“事前”的审查及限制，也无需担心受到政府报复。

这个定义应该说得很明确了吧，Twitter也不是政府，言论自由对其不适用。


另请参阅Twitter关于这件事发表的博文https://blog.twitter.com/en_us/topics/company/2019/information_operations_directed_at_Hong_Kong.html ，摘录一段：
Based on our intensive investigations, we have reliable evidence to support that this is a coordinated state-backed operation. Specifically, we identified large clusters of accounts behaving in a coordinated manner to amplify messages related to the Hong Kong protests.

All the accounts have been suspended for a range of violations of our platform manipulation policies, which we define as:


  • Spam

  • Coordinated activity

  • Fake accounts

  • Attributed activity

  • Ban evasion




Twitter 的封号操作有理有据，是因为违反了其政策。和言论自由半点关系都没有。
